an5.111:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato kulupako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.111:1.3: Asanthavavissasi ca hoti, anissaravikappi ca, vissatthupasevi ca, upakannakajappi ca, atiyacanako ca.
an5.111:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato kulupako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.111:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato kulupako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.111:2.3: Na asanthavavissasi ca hoti, na anissaravikappi ca, na vissatthupasevi ca, na upakannakajappi ca, na atiyacanako ca.
an5.111:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato kulupako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
